projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
It's possible for an iOS or WatchOS Simulator to be deleted, but the device directory to remain. The current ioslib only detects simulators by walking the filesystem. This leads to an inconsistent state.

Instead, we should just eat the cost of subprocessing simctl. I think we're still going to have to read each device's plist file to get additional info.
fields.summary: ioslib: Use simctl to get list of all simulators

comments.body: This appears to have been resolved back in ioslib@1.1.0 over 3 years ago.
